name: Behold Battle
description:
Guess which army will win, and watch them fight for your amusement. Behold Battle is a simple auto battler, where you see heroes and monsters fight to the death in randomly generated battles.

Features:
- A normal game mode that has 20 rounds with increasing army complexity. Guess correctly to continue, or game over if you are wrong too many times.

- A simulator where you create both armies and watch them battle.

- 72 different units, some with unique attacks such as spawning undead minions.

- From small to gigantic battles, and many difficulties to test your prediction powers.

- Gold betting mode, and a spell mode where each side gets a random spell.

- Complete challenges to earn more spectators.

Please note: Behold Battle uses the same art as Mage and Monsters, but has a very different core gameplay loop. It is a much more simple and casual game, where you judge how strong one army will be against another. Or just play around in the sandbox mode. A lot of time and care have gone into creating many different variations of this simple idea of guessing who will win. I have strived to make Behold Battle as polished as I can, so hopefully for many it is an intuitive, unique and enjoyable game.
